author: ETA PRIME
description:
Meet the Red Magic 11 Pro, the craziest gaming phone we’ve ever tested!
This beast is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5, clocks up to 4.6 GHz, and has a built-in liquid cooling system you can actually see flowing through the back of the phone!
In this video, we test its 144 Hz AMOLED display, Adreno 840 GPU, gaming triggers, RGB lighting, and benchmark it against the previous Red Magic 10 Pro. We’ll also push it with Android gaming, Fortnite 120 FPS, and even PC game emulation using Game Hub.
If you’re into handhelds, gaming phones, or extreme mobile performance — this might be the most powerful Android device of 2025.

Learn More Here: https://redmagic.tech/

🧩 Specs Highlights
Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 (4.6 GHz)
Adreno 840 GPU @ 1.2 GHz
7,500 mAh Battery / 80 W Fast Charge
144 Hz BOE X10 AMOLED 6.85"
Liquid-Cooled Transparent Design
LPDDR5X RAM + UFS 4.1 Storage

title: World’s First LIQUID-Cooled Gaming Phone! Red Magic 11 Pro Is INSANE!
